languages.text: "Даже на мгновение постичь ход ее мыслей чудовищно опасно. Многие теряли рассудок и даже жизнь, пытаясь сыграть на сцене главного врага нашего рода, но лишь Аребенниан это под силу. И потому их уважают и боятся все сородичи — от провидцев Детей Азуриана до архонтов Темного города".

traits.locale_text: "Даже на мгновение постичь ход ее мыслей чудовищно опасно. Многие теряли рассудок и даже жизнь, пытаясь сыграть на сцене главного врага нашего рода, но лишь Аребенниан это под силу. И потому их уважают и боятся все сородичи — от провидцев Детей Азуриана до архонтов Темного Города".

languages.text: "To delve into the mind of She Who Thirsts, even for a moment, is extremely perilous. Many have lost their sanity and even their life attempting to portray our kind's greatest enemy upon the stage. Only the Arebennian are capable of such a feat, and for that reason they are respected and feared by all Aeldari — from the Farseers of the Asuryani to the Archons of the Dark City."
languages.original_text: "Даже на мгновение постичь ход ее мыслей чудовищно опасно. Многие теряли рассудок и даже жизнь, пытаясь сыграть на сцене главного врага нашего рода, но лишь Аребенниан это под силу. И потому их уважают и боятся все сородичи — от провидцев Детей Азуриана до архонтов Темного города".

Only the Arebennian are capable of such a feat, and for that reason they are respected and feared by all Aeldari — from the Farseers of the Asuryani to the Archons of the Dark City."

Only the Arebennian are capable of such a feat, and for that reason they are respected and feared by all Aeldari — from the Farseers of the Asuryani to the Archons of the Dark City."

languages.text: “深入了解饥渴女士的思想是极其危险的事情，哪怕仅仅是片刻也不例外。在扮演我们这位宿敌的过程中，许多人都丧失了理智，甚至丢了性命，只有独角才有能力完成这样的壮举。因此，所有艾达灵族都对他们充满了尊重与敬畏。无论是方舟灵族的先知，还是黑暗之城的执政官，都不例外。”
languages.original_text: "To delve into the mind of She Who Thirsts, even for a moment, is extremely perilous. Many have lost their sanity and even their life attempting to portray our kind's greatest enemy upon the stage. Only the Arebennian are capable of such a feat, and for that reason they are respected and feared by all Aeldari — from the Farseers of the Asuryani to the Archons of the Dark City."

traits.locale_text: “深入了解饥渴女士的思想是极其危险的事情，哪怕仅仅是片刻也不例外。在扮演我们这位宿敌的过程中，许多人都丧尸了理智，甚至丢了性命，只有独角才有能力完成这样的壮举。因此，所有艾达灵族都对他们充满了尊重与敬畏。无论是方舟灵族的先知，还是黑暗之城的执政官，都不例外。”

languages.text: «Adentrarse en la mente de la Sedienta, aun por un instante, es extremadamente arriesgado. Muchos han perdido la cordura e incluso la vida tratando de representar a la mayor enemiga de nuestra especie sobre el escenario. Solo los Arebennian están capacitados para lograrlo, y eso hace que todos los Aeldari los teman y los respeten, desde los videntes de los Asuryani hasta los Arcontes de la Ciudad Siniestra».
languages.original_text: "To delve into the mind of She Who Thirsts, even for a moment, is extremely perilous. Many have lost their sanity and even their life attempting to portray our kind's greatest enemy upon the stage. Only the Arebennian are capable of such a feat, and for that reason they are respected and feared by all Aeldari — from the Farseers of the Asuryani to the Archons of the Dark City."

traits.locale_text: «Adentrarse en la mente de la Sedienta, aun por un instante, es extremadamente arriesgado. Muchos han perdido la cordura e incluso la vida tratando de representar a la mayor enemiga de nuestra especie sobre el escenario. Solo los Arebennian están capacitados para lograrlo, y eso hace que todos los Aeldari los teman y los respeten, desde los videntes de los Asuryani hasta los Arcontes de la Ciudad Siniestra».

languages.text: 「ほんの一瞬であっても、かの渇きたる女の心の中に入り込むのは非常に危険だ。多くの者が正気を失い、我が種族の最大の敵を舞台上で演じるために命を懸けた者もいる。このような偉業を成し遂げられるのはアーベニアンだけであり、それゆえに彼らはアシュリヤーニの先見司から仄暗き都のアーコンまで、すべてのアエルダリから尊敬され、恐れられている」
languages.original_text: "To delve into the mind of She Who Thirsts, even for a moment, is extremely perilous. Many have lost their sanity and even their life attempting to portray our kind's greatest enemy upon the stage. Only the Arebennian are capable of such a feat, and for that reason they are respected and feared by all Aeldari — from the Farseers of the Asuryani to the Archons of the Dark City."

traits.locale_text: 「ほんの一瞬であっても、かの渇きたる女の心の中に入り込むのは非常に危険だ。多くの者が正気を失い、我が種族の最大の敵を舞台上で演じるために命を懸けた者もいる。このような偉業を成し遂げられるのはアーベニアンだけであり、それゆえに彼らはアシュリヤーニの先見司から仄暗き都のアーコンまで、すべてのアエルダリから尊敬され、恐れられている」

languages.text: "In den Verstand von Ihr, die dürstet, einzutauchen, ist äußerst gefährlich, selbst wenn es nur für einen kurzen Augenblick ist. Viele haben ihren Verstand und sogar ihr Leben verloren, als sie versucht haben, den größten Feind unseres Volkes auf der Bühne darzustellen. Nur die Arebennian sind dazu in der Lage, weshalb sie von allen Aeldari respektiert und gefürchtet werden — von den Runenpropheten der Asuryani ebenso wie von den Archonten der Dunklen Stadt."
languages.original_text: "To delve into the mind of She Who Thirsts, even for a moment, is extremely perilous. Many have lost their sanity and even their life attempting to portray our kind's greatest enemy upon the stage. Only the Arebennian are capable of such a feat, and for that reason they are respected and feared by all Aeldari — from the Farseers of the Asuryani to the Archons of the Dark City."

traits.locale_text: "In den Verstand von Ihr, die dürstet, einzutauchen, ist äußerst gefährlich, selbst wenn es nur für einen kurzen Augenblick ist. Viele haben ihren Verstand und sogar ihr Leben verloren, als sie versucht haben, den größten Feind unseres Volkes auf der Bühne darzustellen. Nur die Arebennian sind dazu in der Lage, weshalb sie von allen Aeldari respektiert und gefürchtet werden — von den Runenpropheten der Asuryani ebenso wie von den Archonten der Dunklen Stadt."

languages.text: « Il est terriblement dangereux de plonger dans l'esprit de l'Assoiffée, ne serait-ce qu'un instant. Nombreux sont ceux qui ont perdu la tête et même la vie en tentant d'incarner la plus grande ennemie de notre espèce sur scène. Seuls les Arebennians sont capables d'un tel exploit, c'est pourquoi ils sont à la fois respectés et craints de tous les Aeldaris, depuis les Grands Prophètes des Asuryanis jusqu'aux archontes de la Cité Crépusculaire. »
languages.original_text: "To delve into the mind of She Who Thirsts, even for a moment, is extremely perilous. Many have lost their sanity and even their life attempting to portray our kind's greatest enemy upon the stage. Only the Arebennian are capable of such a feat, and for that reason they are respected and feared by all Aeldari — from the Farseers of the Asuryani to the Archons of the Dark City."

traits.locale_text: « Il est terriblement dangereux de plonger dans l'esprit de l'Assoiffée, ne serait-ce qu'un instant. Nombreux sont ceux qui ont perdu la tête et même la vie en tentant d'incarner la plus grande ennemie de notre espèce sur scène. Seuls les arebennians sont capables d'un tel exploit, c'est pourquoi ils sont à la fois respectés et craints de tous les Aeldaris, depuis les Grands Prophètes des Asuryanis jusqu'aux archontes de la Cité Crépusculaire. »

languages.text: "Susayan'ın zihnini bir anlığına bile olsa kurcalamak, çok büyük bir tehlike taşır. Sahnede halkımızın en büyük düşmanını canlandırmayı deneyen niceleri; akıl sağlıklarını, hatta hayatlarını kaybetmiştir. Böylesi bir yetiye yalnızca Arebennian sahiptir. Bundandır ki Asuryani Ötesezenlerinden Kara Şehir Arkonlarına kadar tüm Aeldariler, onlara hem saygı hem de korkuyla yaklaşır."
languages.original_text: "To delve into the mind of She Who Thirsts, even for a moment, is extremely perilous. Many have lost their sanity and even their life attempting to portray our kind's greatest enemy upon the stage. Only the Arebennian are capable of such a feat, and for that reason they are respected and feared by all Aeldari — from the Farseers of the Asuryani to the Archons of the Dark City."

traits.locale_text: "Susayan'ın zihnini bir anlığına bile olsa kurcalamak, çok büyük bir tehlike taşır. Sahnede halkımızın en büyük düşmanını canlandırmayı deneyen niceleri, akıl sağlıklarını ve hatta hayatlarını kaybetmiştir. Böylesi bir yetiye yalnızca Arebennian sahiptir ve bundandır ki Asuryani Ötesezenlerinden Kara Şehir Arkonlarına kadar tüm Aeldariler, onlara hem saygı hem de korkuyla yaklaşır."
